evidence_in_dialogue: [[Brass]] dr clark and his 'steady hand ' have n't been seen or heard from since , so you do n't have to be a brain surgeon to guess what i 'm thinking
[[Warrick]] i think i found the victim 's internal organs
[[Sara]] killer poured bleach down all the drains
[[Robbins]] deep incised wound of the anterior and lateral neck , transecting both carotids and the anterior trachea
[[Greg]] i got four peaks : ethyl alcohol , propylene glycol , minoxidil , and finasteride
[[Robbins]] the cut on the cartilage of the right distal femur has slight angulations from the , uh ... left distal to the right proximal , which suggests the killer was left-handed
[[Grissom]] you killed them both , and now you have nothing
